¡Bienvenido! Seleccione el sistema para: Welcome! Select the system to log in
SYSTEMS_INFO: The systems present different features for each user's needs. By clicking on the question mark symbols below each system, you will find more information.
POSEIDON-INFO: Poseidon is an information management system for the company's fleet administration. This system allows controlling vehicles, drivers, routes, maintenance, among others. In addition, Poseidon has a reporting module that allows visualizing information in both graphical and tabular formats.
MISSION-INFO: SIMER ELECTRONIC S.A.S is an organization committed to the development of technology (hardware, software) and the commercialization of industrial equipment, electronic materials for automation, consulting, infrastructure in electrical and communication networks. We focus on providing innovative and cutting-edge solutions to our clients, helping them stay ahead in their companies. Our commitment to quality, punctuality, and exceptional service has made us a reliable and respected partner in the market. We have a highly trained and committed team to continuous improvement, allowing us to offer personalized solutions and meet our clients' needs efficiently and effectively.
VISION-INFO: SIMER ELECTRONIC S.A.S will strive to strengthen and expand our relationships and alliances with strategic partners, establishing solid foundations that allow us to lead the national market firmly, efficiently, innovatively, and timely. We seek to be recognized as leaders in the development and commercialization of technology, providing comprehensive and high-value-added solutions to our clients throughout the country. We will work closely with our clients to understand and meet their ever-evolving needs, thereby contributing to mutual growth and success.
ENTERPRISE-INFO: SIMER ELECTRONIC S.A.S is a company specialized in the development of hardware and software for the security, optimization, and automation of industrial processes. We offer a wide range of services and products that are implemented in the industrial, commercial, and residential fields. Our focus is on providing comprehensive and high-quality solutions to our clients, helping them improve efficiency, safety, and productivity in their operations. Through our Virtual Store, we offer convenient access to our range of products and services, allowing our clients to find the solutions that best suit their specific needs.
title: Terms and Conditions - Legal Notice
responsability:
SIMER ELECTRONIC SAS
Pasto, Nariño, Colombia
Manager: Carlos Burbano Burbano
Technical Manager: Héctor Ancízar Benavides
Technology Director: Reinel Andrés Mora
description: The application is a data management platform for the operation of the POSEIDON hardware device, manufactured by SIMER ELECTRONIC SAS. The system controls the delivery of LPG gas at physical points (establishments) with supply tanks, managing the amount of gas delivered, information for billing, and various administrative functions, such as user control, location control, customer control, and vehicle fleet control. In addition, the application allows generating reports and receiving route event notifications.
recopilation: User data is stored in a database, and sensitive information, such as passwords, is encrypted using bcrypt. Data requests are handled through HTTP requests to an API that interacts with the server. User information can only be accessed through specific requests to the server.
policity: SIMER ELECTRONIC SAS is responsible for the use and maintenance of the data collected by the application. For any inquiries related to data privacy, users have the right to exercise their rights of privacy, access, rectification, cancellation, and opposition in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law in Colombia. To exercise these rights or for any inquiries related to data privacy, users can contact us through the following means: Email: contacto@simerelectronics.com, Phone: +57 3113775220 - (60) 27340438, Postal Address: 520001. The data collected by the application is used to provide and improve the services offered. This includes, but is not limited to, managing the delivery of LPG gas, controlling users and roles, managing locations and clients, controlling the vehicle fleet, generating reports, and receiving notifications of route events. The information is used solely for the specified purposes and is retained for the time necessary to fulfill these purposes. We do not share users' data with third parties, except when necessary for the provision of services offered by the application. In such cases, appropriate measures will be taken to ensure the protection of personal data in accordance with Colombian legislation on personal data protection. Users are responsible for using the application in accordance with applicable laws and regulations and the established terms of use. This includes, among other things, not disclosing sensitive information to third parties and keeping their access credentials secure. Additionally, users must comply with any other policy or procedure established by SIMER ELECTRONIC SAS regarding data security.
conditions: By using this application, the user agrees that the information provided will be used solely for the purposes described in the Privacy Policy. The data collected by the application is encapsulated within the platform and will not be shared outside it, except when necessary for the provision of the services offered by the application, in accordance with Colombian legislation on personal data protection. Users undertake to use the application in accordance with applicable laws and regulations and the established terms of use.
laws: This application is governed by the Personal Data Protection Law, also known as Law 1581 of 2012, of the Republic of Colombia. This law recognizes and protects the right of all people to know, update, and rectify the information collected about them in databases or files that are susceptible to processing by entities of a public or private nature. Therefore, all data collected by the application is handled in accordance with this law, and users have the corresponding rights over their personal data.
limitations: SIMER ELECTRONIC SAS is not responsible for the misuse of the application by users or for any direct or indirect damage that may arise from its use, except in cases where liability is established by law. Additionally, SIMER ELECTRONIC SAS will not be responsible for the disclosure of users' personal information outside the platform, except in cases permitted by Colombian legislation on personal data protection and in accordance with the established Privacy Policy. Users use the application at their own risk and agree to indemnify and hold SIMER ELECTRONIC SAS harmless from any claim, damage, loss, or expense, including legal fees, arising from the use of the application.

Las sucursales son puntos físicos con ta: Branches are physical points with stationary LPG tanks

Las Ciudades son registros necesarios pa: Cities are necessary records for the creation of branches and to establish where they belong
Tenga en cuenta que el nombre del cargo: Please note that the name of the position is a strict field, so you must enter this field correctly.
Los Clientes son usuarios con un cargo d: Clients are users with a position within an establishment
Los Derroteros son registros de seguimie: Courses are tracking records for the routes assigned to the operator
Los Estados son registros necesarios par: States are necessary records for the creation of branches and cities to establish where they belong
El factor es un ajuste que se realiza pa: The factor is an adjustment made for the loading of stationary tanks
Este evento sucede cuando se detecta un: This event occurs when a refueling without product or mass and volume 0 is detected
Este evento sucede cuando algún usuario: This event occurs when a user changes the time of the PDA device
This event occurs when a user changes the date of the PDA device
Este evento sucede cuando se imprime el: This event occurs when the event report is printed
This event occurs when the service report is printed
Este evento sucede cuando la batería de: This event occurs when the backup battery drops below the allowed voltage
Este evento sucede cuando la impresora n: This event occurs when the printer is out of paper
Este evento sucede cuando no se encuentr: This event occurs when the printer is not found
Este evento sucede cuando se cancela un: This event occurs when an order is canceled
Este evento sucede cuando la batería de: This event occurs when the PDA battery is below 15%
Este evento sucede cuando el cable de al: This event occurs when the power cable is disconnected
Este evento sucede cuando se conecta el: This event occurs when the power cable is connected
Este evento sucede cuando un usuario de: This event occurs when an operator user has closed the application
Este evento sucede cuando el operario sa: This event occurs when the operator leaves his established route
Este evento sucede cuando se intenta gen: This event occurs when an attempt is made to generate a referral with an existing record

Los Cargos son registros que identifican: Occupations are records that identify the role of a client in a branch
Los pedidos son solicitudes de cargue pa: Orders are loading requests for establishments
Los permisos establecen las funciones de: Permissions establish the functions of a user within the application
La escritura permite al usuario añadir i: Writing allows the user to add information to the system parameters.
La edición permite al usuario cambiar la: Editing allows the user to change the information of the system parameters.
La lectura permite al usuario visualizar: Reading allows the user to view the information of the system parameters.
Escriba aquí la placa del Auto Tanque: Enter the Tank Truck plate here

Los Auto Tanques son vehiculos usados pa: Tank Trucks are vehicles used for the distribution of LPG
Los servicios son reportes de pedidos qu: Services are reports of orders that have been completed
Los Roles identifican las funciones que: Roles identify the functions that a user will have
Escriba aquí la placa del Tanque estacio: Enter the Stationary Tank plate here

Los tanques estacionarios son contenedor: Stationary tanks are LPG storage containers installed in establishments
Las tabletas son dispositivos electrónic: Tablets are mobile electronic devices with an android system that allow LPG loading operations
Los usuarios son las identidades que int: Users are the identities that interact with the application
Las Zonas son necesarias para crear sucu: Zones are necessary to create branches and establish in which part of the city the branch is located

El reporte general muestra la informació: The general report shows the packaging information for a specific date (remember that information changes with a considerable amount of data can generate long execution times).
Se mostrara únicamente la información re: Only the information made in the selected period will be shown
Presione Error, Satisfactorias o Pendien: Press Error, Satisfactory or Pending twice to display the information
El reporte general muestra la informació: The general report shows the loading process information for a specific date (remember that information changes with a considerable amount of data can generate long execution times).

En esta sección se muestran reportes de: This section shows reports of the tank trucks in operation
no tienes Permiso para ver las notificac: You do not have permission to view notifications
Esta información será utilizada para per: This information will be used to personalize and give identity to the messages generated by the system, which include notifications directed to customers and communications with third parties. Please note that without this information, the system will not be able to send emails for token information or loading validation to the customer.
Falta producto según la medicion de dens: Missing product according to the average density measurement
Sobra producto según la medicion de dens: Surplus product according to the average density measurement
Falta producto según la medicion volumét: Missing product according to the average volumetric (2.02)
Sobra producto según la medicion volumét: Surplus product according to the average volumetric (2.02)
El sistema de control de inventario util: The inventory control system uses volumetric calculations based on specific formulas to determine, with high precision, the quantities of LPG in liquid and vapor state inside the tank. This allows to obtain an almost exact measurement of the total content
Los registros de derrotero contienen inf: Course records contain key information about the loads made during the execution of a route. Among the most relevant data are: the number of orders in progress and completed, the volume of product delivered, the person responsible assigned to the route, the last date of record update, among others
Plataforma de telemetría que mide nivele: Telemetry platform that measures levels in tanks. It generates alerts when reaching critical thresholds, avoiding shortages.
Solución para controlar entregas de GLP: Solution to control LPG deliveries with tank trucks. Monitors in real time using wireless communication for efficient distribution.
Sistema de control que integra hardware: System that integrates hardware and software for precise filling of LPG cylinders. Easy to install, versatile, safe, and traceable.
Sistema de monitoreo para tanques de alm: Monitoring system for LPG storage tanks. Uses level, pressure, and temperature sensors for comprehensive supervision.
Versión adaptada de POSEIDON para el con: Adapted version of POSEIDON for the control and monitoring of diesel deliveries with logistical support and remote communication.
Soluciones que te permiten avanzar con s: Solutions that allow you to move forward with security and precision.
Empresa Colombiana especializada en el d: Colombian company specialized in the development of HARDWARE and SOFTWARE for the SECURITY, OPTIMIZATION AND AUTOMATION of industrial and residential processes. We have a wide variety of services and products
¡No dudes en contactarnos! Si tienes alg: Don't hesitate to contact us! If you have any questions, comments, or a collaboration proposal, we would love to hear from you.
